mapper.select: select * from weather where city_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `weather`(`city_name`,`date`,dayweather,daytemp,daywind,daypower,nightweather,nighttemp,nightwind,nightpower) VALUES(#{cityName},#{date},#{dayweather},#{daytemp},#{daywind},#{daypower},#{nightweather},#{nighttemp},#{nightwind},#{nightpower}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE dayweather=#{dayweather},daytemp=#{daytemp},daywind=#{daywind},daypower=#{daypower},nightweather=#{nightweather},nighttemp=#{nighttemp},nightwind=#{nightwind},nightpower=#{nightpower};
